At Red Hat, we connect an innovative community of customers, partners, and contributors to deliver an open source stack of trusted, high-performing solutions. We offer cloud, Linux, middleware, storage, and virtualization technologies, together with award-winning global customer support, consulting, and implementation services. Red Hat is a rapidly growing company supporting more than 90% of Fortune 500 companies.Mission: To be the catalyst in communities of customers, contributors, and partners creating better technology the open source way.

GitLab is the optimized open-source code collaboration platform that allows a full workflow to create, review, and deploy code simply and effectively. GitLab includes Git repository management, code review, issue tracking, wikis and more, along with GitLab CI, a continuous integration and deployment tool. Highlights:Intel, Juniper, Kaiser, LinkedIn, NVIDIA, Oracle, Riot Games, Synopsys

Hired to cover extensive list of Enterprise Accounts (55) in first year with minimal support from Solution Architects or Inside Sales. Managed to hit number and grow revenue over 60% by year-end. Added several new Strategic Accounts in second year while reducing territory to a total of 8 Enterprise Accounts for a much more strategic focus.Highlights: Brocade, Flex, Gilead, JDSU, Oracle, PG&E, Pivotal Software, Symantec

As the first Sr. Sales Specialist, my role has been to evangelize the new OpenStack based offering from HP as we enter the market to challenge the incumbent players. I have been a key team member bringing our message to market while demonstrating early success to gain us much needed credibility. Highlights:• Aquantia, Canonical, CliQr, DreamWorks, GetGoing, Harmonic, InkaBinka, Intel, Lookout, PZFlex, Ricoh, Sprinklr, TripIt, Workday, Zuora

As the first West Coast Director for Exigen Services, an Inc. 5000 global IT company that provides application outsourcing services to clients within the Financial Services, Insurance, Telecom and Media industries using offshore resources (Russia and China), I was tasked with establishing a local sales presence at company headquarters in San Francisco. In addition to maintaining and growing the America’s region, my sales responsibilities include closing deals in the West coast region.  Highlights:•	Sony, Facebook, NETGEAR, Logitech and several startups.  •	Managed and grew SAP, Adobe and Sun Microsystems.

Jim and I worked together at GitLab and collaborated before his time at Gitlab on some joint projects involving our respective companies. The first thing that comes to mind, when I think of Jim, is how much of a go getter he is. He is enthusiastic, hungry, and extremely driven. He has more hustle than anyone I have ever seen. Jim is extremely outgoing; he knows everyones name in the room, who they work for, and what their favorite past time is. He is great at connecting people and making things happen without delay.

August 6, 2016, Jonathan was a client of James’

I worked with Jim when he was BlueKai-Oracle's AWS representative. Jim was an enthusiastic advocate for AWS and the cloud ecosystem and a pleasure to work with. We were able to improve the quality of our AWS usage and reduce our costs through Jim's recommendations and the recommendations of other experts he introduced us to. Jim kept us updated with all the new AWS products and services coming out with regular messages and meetings. In addition, Jim found complementary partnerships and products for us including CloudHealth and Hortonworks that we continue to have close working relationships with. It was a great pleasure to work with Jim in this position and I look forward to continuing to work with him.

Lee has to be one of the most effective and efficient promotions into leadership that I have ever seen. He took the helm of the Support team shortly after I started working with him and quickly albeit continuously proved to be a fantastic leader for the most important team in a hyper growth startup that is GitLab. From pre sales to consulting to training there was nothing Lee and team wouldn't do to help fill the organizational challenges we had along the way. The technology stack that underpins GitLab has challenged Lee to find and train and retain some of the best in class technologist I have seen in the industry and he does it with ease.

summary: I have 15+ years of experience managing Field Sales, Inside Sales, Account Managers and Systems Engineers and have the proven ability of streamlining and building revenue by building teams of winning professionals.  I have excelled with managing inherited teams and have also built teams from scratch.  I am an ideal first VP, Director of Sales or Regional Sales Manager and have the privilege of stating that most of the companies for whom I worked have been acquired.  I have extensive expertise in start up, mid market and enterprise environments.
